item.description:
It's time for Thai - at Sukhothai Restaurant in Manchester, Wednesday 11/11/09 at 7:00pm. A very good place that's big enough to fit our group, plenty parking on the street or around the corner. They have an interesting Sake, and some very good signature dishes. Here is their website: http://www.sukhothaic...

As always: Please be courteous and come on time, be sure to change your RSVP if you can't make it at least 48 hours in advance. I will collect $1.00 toward the costs of running this meetup at the event.

See you there! - Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Sukhothai Restaurant 11/11/09 at 7:00pm
